data.headTitle: Vietnamese Software Development Outsourcing Company | Logix Technology
data.title: Vietnamese Software Development Outsourcing Company | Logix Technology
data.subTitle: A reliable Vietnamese Software Development Outsourcing Company, Logix Technology provides global customers with exceptional software development outsourcing services at reasonable prices

introduction.title: about us
introduction.content: Logix Technology - Vietnamese Offshore Outsourcing Company Founded in 2015, Logix Technology is a software development company based in Vietnam that focuses on outsourcing requests from outside. We specializes in all Microsoft's technology suites, with a heavy emphasis on Azure & cloud-based technologies.

feedbackList.name: Franco S.
feedbackList.content: We are very happy about the collaboration with you. Your support and your knowledge is the fundamental of the success of this project. With your visit, you confirmed it and for that I am very grateful.

feedbackList.name: Eric Eaton
feedbackList.content: Our client is VERY HAPPY with the work that is being produced! They are most grateful, and expresses it regularly. As a team, we are so thankful for all your help and great work. And we are very anxious to work with you on projects!

feedbackList.name: Roland Ts.
feedbackList.content: It is now time to thank you all for your work and engagements, willing to drill down to the smallest detail and come back with great solutions for our customers.  I am proud to count on such a great team and proud about all great deliverable and solutions we provided.
